metadata.title: CVE-2024-41123 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: REXML is an XML toolkit for Ruby. The REXML gem before 3.3.2 has some DoSvulnerabilities when it parses an XML that has many specific characterssuch as whitespace character, `>]` and `]>`. The REXML gem 3.3.3 or laterinclude the patches to fix these vulnerabilities.

criterions.comment: ruby3.2 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
jruby package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
